channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2023111273
item.description:
Report X-2023111273

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-21
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package handler picked up the drum by the cover instead of the pail's handle and wound up accidentally pulling the cover out of alignment. liquid splashed out. package handler set it aside and immediately notified management, who notified QA. QA admin retrieved it in a lined tote, brought it to the damage area, and placed it atop the drain mats in the incoming damaged hazmat/LQ area. in-house cleanup, awaiting disposition. DescribePack: cover is dislodged on one side, allowing liquid to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: immediate in-house cleanup. placed in lined tote, moved to drain mats

item.title: Report X-2023111158
item.description:
Report X-2023111158

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: damaged hazmat was discovered this morning on the inbound. it was placed in a lined tote and brought to the damage area, where it was moved to the drain mats in the incoming damaged hazmat/LQ area. in-house cleanup, awaiting disposition. DescribePack: one bag leaked due to loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in lined tote, moved to drain mats

item.title: Report X-2023110839
item.description:
Report X-2023110839

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023110839 SequenceEvent: Package arrived at Station with obvious damage. Immediately placed into plastic lined tote and added to damaged hazmat drain mats. DescribePack: One gallon had a loose cap causing interior leakage. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Immediately placed into plastic lined tote and added to damaged hazmat drain mats. 2. X-2023110843 SequenceEvent: Package arrived at station damaged. Immediately placed into a plastic lined tote, added to drain mat. DescribePack: Internal leaking caused by a loose cap/lid. Box was damp. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Immediately placed into a plastic lined tote, added to drain mat. 3. X-2023110844 SequenceEvent: Package arrived at Station damaged. Immediately placed into a plastic lined tote and added to drain mats. DescribePack: Loose cap caused internal leakage. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Immediately placed into a plastic lined tote and added to drain mats.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: loading dock manager called out a damaged hazmat over the radio. QA admin responded and retrieved it, placing it in a lined tote, bringing it to the damage area, and moving it to the drain mats in the incoming damaged hazmat/LQ area. in-house cleanup, awaiting disposition. DescribePack: one bottle leaked due to loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: immediate spill response. placed in lined tote, moved to drain mats.
